心.definition: heart; mind; intention; center; core; CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]

心不在焉.definition: absent-minded; preoccupied; inattentive; with one's thoughts wandering

心中.definition: central point; in one's thoughts; in one's heart

心中無數.definition: to have no idea; to be unsure

心亂如麻.definition: one's thoughts in a whirl (idiom); confused; disconcerted; upset

心事.definition: a load on one's mind; worry; CL:宗[zong1],樁|桩[zhuang1]

心事重重.definition: to have a lot on one's mind; to be laden with anxiety

心力交瘁.definition: to be both mentally and physically exhausted (idiom)

心勁.definition: thoughts; what one has in one's heart

心動.definition: heartbeat; heart rate; (fig.) emotionally affected; aroused (of desire, emotion, interest etc)

心口.definition: pit of the stomach; solar plexus; words and thoughts

心口不一.definition: heart and mouth at variance (idiom); keeping one's real intentions to oneself; saying one thing but meaning sth different

心口如一.definition: lit. heart and mouth as one (idiom); to say what you think; honest and straightforward

心塞.definition: (coll.) to feel sick at heart; to feel stifled; to feel crushed

心境.definition: mood; mental state; frame of mind

心如刀割.definition: to feel as if having one's heart cut out (idiom); to be torn with grief

心如刀絞.definition: to feel a pain like a knife being twisted in one's heart (idiom)

心如止水.definition: to be at peace with oneself

心存不滿.definition: to be discontented; to be dissatisfied

心學.definition: School of Mind; Neo-Confucian Idealistic School (from Song to mid-Qing times, c. 1000-1750, typified by the teachings of Wang Yangming 王陽明|王阳明[Wang2 Yang2 ming2])

心安理得.definition: to have a clear conscience; to have no qualms about sth

心安神閑.definition: with one's heart at ease and one's spirit at rest (idiom)

心室顫動.definition: ventricular fibrillation (V-fib), abbr. to 室顫|室颤[shi4 chan4]

心宿二.definition: Antares, the brightest star in Scorpio 天蠍座|天蝎座[Tian1 xie1 zuo4]

心寬體胖.definition: big-hearted and serene (idiom); contented and easygoing

心尖.definition: bottom tip of the heart; fig. innermost feelings; coll. my darling

心平氣和.definition: tranquil and even-tempered (idiom); calmly and without stress

心廣體胖.definition: big-hearted and serene (idiom); contended and easygoing

心影兒.definition: (Taiwan usage) child in need of help (orphaned, abandoned, abused etc)

心得.definition: what one has learned (through experience, reading etc); knowledge; insight; understanding; tips; CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]

心得安.definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)

心心念念.definition: (idiom) to constantly think about; to be preoccupied with; to set one's heart on

心心相印.definition: two hearts beat as one (idiom); a kindred spirit

心急吃不了熱豆腐.pinyin: xīn jí chī bù liǎo rè dòu fǔ
心急吃不了熱豆腐.definition: hasty men don't get to eat hot tofu (idiom); one just has to be patient; haste will ruin everything

心悅誠服.definition: to submit cheerfully; to accept willingly (idiom)

心情.definition: mood; frame of mind; CL:個|个[ge4]

心想.definition: to think to oneself; to think

心想事成.definition: (idiom) to have one's wishes come true; wish you the best!

心態.definition: attitude (of the heart); state of one's psyche; way of thinking; mentality

心懷.definition: to harbor (thoughts); to cherish; to entertain (illusions)

心懷叵測.definition: see 居心叵測|居心叵测[ju1 xin1 po3 ce4]

心戰.definition: psychological warfare; (literary) to be inwardly terrorized

心房.definition: heart (as the seat of emotions); cardiac atrium

心拙口夯.definition: variant of 心拙口笨[xin1 zhuo1 kou3 ben4]

心摺.definition: convinced; to admire from the heart; enchanted

心曠神怡.definition: lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed

心有靈犀一點通.pinyin: xīn yǒu líng xī yī diǎn tōng
心有靈犀一點通.definition: hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one

心有餘悸.definition: to have lingering fears; trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)

心有餘而力不足.pinyin: xīn yǒu yú ér lì bù zú
心有餘而力不足.definition: the will is there, but not the strength (idiom); the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak

心有餘，力不足.pinyin: xīn yǒu yú ， lì bù zú
心有餘，力不足.definition: The will is there, but not the strength (idiom, from Confucian Analects).; I really want to do it, but don't have the resources.; The spirit is willing but the flesh is weak.

心服.definition: to accept wholeheartedly; to embrace; to be won over

心服口服.definition: (idiom) to accept wholeheartedly; to embrace; to be won over

心根.definition: the innermost depths of one's heart; (Buddhism) manas (the mind)

心梗.definition: myocardial infarction; heart attack (abbr. for 心肌梗死[xin1 ji1 geng3 si4])

心氣.definition: intention; motive; state of mind; ambition; aspiration; heart 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)

心無二用.definition: one cannot concentrate on two things at the same time

心煩.definition: to feel agitated; to be troubled; to be annoyed; an upset or distraction

心煩意亂.definition: lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety

心猿意馬.definition: lit. heart like a frisky monkey, mind like a cantering horse (idiom); fig. capricious (derog.); to have ants in one's pants; hyperactive; adventurous and uncontrollable

心理作用.definition: a perception that doesn't reflect reality; a notion based on an erroneous belief

心甘.definition: to be willing; to be satisfied

心甘情願.definition: delighted to (do sth, idiom); perfectly happy to do; most willing to do

心疼.definition: to love dearly; to feel sorry for sb; to regret; to grudge; to be distressed

心病.definition: anxiety; sore point; secret worry; mental disorder; heart disease (medicine)

心痛.definition: to feel distressed about sth; heartache; cardiac pain

心目中.definition: in one's eyes; in one's estimation

心直口快.definition: frank and outspoken (idiom); straight speaking; to say what one thinks

心直嘴快.definition: frank and outspoken; straight speaking; to say what one thinks

心眼.definition: heart; intention; conscience; consideration; cleverness; tolerance

心眼兒.definition: one's thoughts; mind; intention; willingness to accept new ideas; baseless suspicions

心眼大.definition: magnanimous; considerate; thoughtful; able to think of everything that needs to be thought of

心砰砰跳.definition: variant of 心怦怦跳[xin1 peng1 peng1 tiao4]

心神.definition: mind; state of mind; attention; (Chinese medicine) psychic constitution

心神不屬.definition: see 心不在焉[xin1 bu4 zai4 yan1]

心神專註.definition: to concentrate one's attention; to be fully focused

心窩兒.definition: one's breast; the pit of one's stomach

心竅.definition: the mind; capacity for clear thinking

心算.definition: mental arithmetic; to calculate in one's head; planning; preparation

心結.definition: a matter that gnaws at one's mind; preoccupation; sore point; rancor

心肝寶貝.definition: precious darling (often refers to one's child); sweetheart

心腸.definition: heart; intention; one's inclination; state of mind; to have the heart for sth; mood

心腹之患.definition: lit. calamity within one's bosom (idiom); major trouble hidden within

心膽俱裂.definition: to be scared out of one's wits (idiom)

心臟搭橋手術.pinyin: xīn zàng dā qiáo shǒu shù

心臟病發作.definition: heart attack; to have a heart attack

心花怒放.definition: to burst with joy (idiom); to be over the moon; to be elated

心虛.definition: lacking in confidence; diffident; to have a guilty conscience

心血.definition: heart's blood; expenditure (for some project); meticulous care

心血來潮.definition: to be prompted by a sudden impulse; carried away by a whim; to have a brainstorm

心術.definition: designs; schemes; intentions; scheming; calculating (of a person)

心裡有數.definition: to know the score (idiom); to be well aware of the situation

心裡有譜.definition: to have a plan in mind

心裡有鬼.definition: to have secret motives; to have a guilty conscience

心裡癢癢.definition: (idiom) to feel a strong urge (to do sth)

心裡美蘿蔔.definition: Chinese roseheart radish (shinrimei radish), green on the outside, purple-red on the inside, a favorite Beijing vegetable

心裡話.definition: (to express one's) true feelings; what is on one's mind; secret mind

心路.definition: scheme; artifice; tolerance; intention; motive; train of thought; brains; wit; ideas

心軟.definition: to be softhearted; to be tenderhearted; to be kindhearted

心輪.definition: anāhata or anahata, the heart chakra 查克拉, residing in the chest

心雜音.definition: see 心臟雜音|心脏杂音[xin1 zang4 za2 yin1]

心靈.definition: bright; smart; quick-witted; heart; thoughts; spirit

心靈雞湯.definition: (often used disparagingly) feel-good motivational story or quote (from the Chinese translation of the title of the 1993 self-help bestseller "Chicken Soup for the Soul")

心靜自然涼.definition: a calm heart keeps you cool (idiom)

心領.definition: I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)

心領神悟.definition: to understand tacitly (idiom); to know intuitively; to understand thoroughly

心領神會.definition: to understand tacitly (idiom); to know intuitively; to understand thoroughly

心頭肉.definition: the person one loves the most; one's most treasured possession

心願.definition: cherished desire; dream; craving; wish; aspiration

心餘力絀.definition: see 心有餘而力不足|心有余而力不足[xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2]

心馳神往.definition: one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person; to long for; infatuated; fascinated

心驚肉跳.definition: lit. heart alarmed, body leaping (idiom); fear and trepidation in the face of disaster

心驚膽戰.definition: lit. heart alarmed, trembling in fear (idiom); prostrate with fear; scared witless

心驚膽顫.definition: see 心驚膽戰|心惊胆战[xin1 jing1 dan3 zhan4]
